titleStmt.title: A consideration of certaine positions archiepiscopall
titleStmt.author: Bradshaw, William, 1571-1618.
Bradshaw, William, 1571-1618. Proposition. Concerning kneeling in the very act of receiving howsoever. aut

notesStmt.note: Printer and publication date conjectured by STC.
"A proposition. Concerning kneeling in the very act of receiuing howsoever" (29 p. at end) has separate title page dated 1605.
Some print show-through; some leaves tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams's Library.
